snippet: The Nets’ regular-season debut at Barclays Center, scheduled for Thursday night, was postponed because of the lingering effects of Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets regular-season debut at Barclays Center against the New York Knicks is postponed because of lingering effects of Hurricane Sandy.

byline.contributor: Howard Beck and Nate Taylor contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The Nets’ regular-season debut at Barclays Center, scheduled for Thursday night, was postponed because of the lingering effects of Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: Nets’ Opener Against Knicks in Brooklyn Is Postponed
headline.main: Nets’ Opener Against the Knicks in Brooklyn Is Postponed
headline.print_headline: Nets’ Opener Against the Knicks in Brooklyn Is Postponed
